name: part_009
file: tmp_【#常闇トワ3周年記念LIVE】MIX2 - 私の居場所 - 【3DLIVE】 [knb_mosTUvo]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Taisetsu Photograph' (大切フォトグラフ).
MC section where Tokoyami Towa thanks the audience and the staff.
Announcement of the 3rd Anniversary Commemorative Goods.

subtitles.original: ふいにギュッと抱きしめたら
subtitles.english: If I suddenly hug you tight

subtitles.original: ほら また笑顔が咲いたよ
subtitles.english: Look, a smile has bloomed again

subtitles.original: 撮り貯めた日常を
subtitles.english: The daily life I've captured and saved

subtitles.original: 寄せ書きみたいに集めてさ
subtitles.english: Collected like a collection of messages

subtitles.original: さよならは胸にしまって
subtitles.english: Keeping goodbyes in my heart

subtitles.original: 肩を寄せて 飽きるくらい話そう
subtitles.english: Leaning shoulder to shoulder, let's talk until we're tired of it

subtitles.original: 限りない想い出
subtitles.english: Boundless memories

subtitles.original: ポケットに詰め込んで
subtitles.english: Packed into my pocket

subtitles.original: 挫けそうな時も 共に支え合える
subtitles.english: Even when we're about to give up, we can support each other

subtitles.original: 大切フォトグラフ
subtitles.english: Precious photograph

subtitles.original: 遥か未来の先へ
subtitles.english: To the far future ahead

subtitles.original: これからも一緒だよ
subtitles.english: We'll be together from now on, too

subtitles.original: 思いっきり笑おう 手を繋ぎ歌おう
subtitles.english: Let's laugh with all our might, hold hands and sing

subtitles.original: この一瞬が いつまでも大好き
subtitles.english: I'll love this moment forever

subtitles.original: 立ち止まって 落ち込む日も
subtitles.english: On days I stop and feel down

subtitles.original: たまにはいいよね
subtitles.english: That's okay once in a while, isn't it?

subtitles.original: わかちあって 寄り添えたら
subtitles.english: If we can share and stay close

subtitles.original: 涙も想い出に変わる
subtitles.english: Even tears will turn into memories

subtitles.original: ささやかな幸せは
subtitles.english: Small happinesses are

subtitles.original: 飾らない毎日の中にあって
subtitles.english: In the midst of unadorned daily life

subtitles.original: ふとした会話や
subtitles.english: Casual conversations and

subtitles.original: 隣歩く日々が 宝物なんだ
subtitles.english: the days we walk side by side are treasures

subtitles.original: 想い出は溢れて
subtitles.english: Memories are overflowing

subtitles.original: 両手じゃ足りないよ
subtitles.english: Both hands aren't enough

subtitles.original: 嬉しさも辛さも 共に笑い合える
subtitles.english: Sharing both joy and pain, we can laugh together

subtitles.original: 大切フォトグラフ
subtitles.english: Precious photograph

subtitles.original: 最高の笑顔と
subtitles.english: With the best smiles and

subtitles.original: とびっきり幸せを
subtitles.english: extraordinary happiness

subtitles.original: 大好きなみんなへ 少し擽ったいけど
subtitles.english: To everyone I love, though it's a bit ticklish

subtitles.original: いつもありがとね
subtitles.english: Thanks for everything, as always

subtitles.original: 遥か未来の先へ
subtitles.english: To the far future ahead

subtitles.original: これからも一緒だよ
subtitles.english: We'll be together from now on, too

subtitles.original: 思いっきり笑おう 手を繋ぎ歌おう
subtitles.english: Let's laugh with all our might, hold hands and sing

subtitles.original: この一瞬が いつまでも大好き
subtitles.english: I'll love this moment forever

subtitles.original: はーい、みんな！どうだったかなー？
subtitles.english: Hi, everyone! How was it?

subtitles.original: ドキドキしたー！
subtitles.english: My heart was pounding!

subtitles.original: いつもありがとね、みんなありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thanks for everything, thank you everyone!

subtitles.original: ということで！常闇トワ3周年記念ライブ！
subtitles.english: And so! Tokoyami Towa's 3rd Anniversary Live!

subtitles.original: 最高でしたねー！
subtitles.english: It was the best, wasn't it!

subtitles.original: 語彙力どこ行った？
subtitles.english: Where did my vocabulary go?

subtitles.original: はい。もうね、見てください！さっき踊りましたこのステージ！
subtitles.english: Yes. Look! This stage where I just danced!

subtitles.original: このステージもね、あのー、作ってもらいました！
subtitles.english: This stage too, was made for me!

subtitles.original: トワのいっぱいわがままを聞いて、素敵なステージにしてくれました！
subtitles.english: They listened to Towa's requests and made it a wonderful stage!

subtitles.original: ありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: Thank you very much!

subtitles.original: ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: あのね、最後までね、今日はね、見てほしいんです！
subtitles.english: You see, I want you to watch until the very end today!

subtitles.original: なんと素晴らしいことが、3つ、4つ？3つ、4つあります！
subtitles.english: There are wonderful things, three, four? Three or four of them!

subtitles.original: では！告知させていただきたいと思います！
subtitles.english: So! I'd like to make some announcements!

subtitles.original: まず一つ目！こちら、ボーン！
subtitles.english: First one! This, boom!

subtitles.original: 常闇トワ3周年記念グッズセットが発売しまーす！
subtitles.english: Towa's 3rd Anniversary Goods set will be on sale!

subtitles.original: はい！最高だー、ありがとう、最高！
subtitles.english: Yes! It's the best, thank you, the best!

subtitles.original: 常闇トワ 活動3周年記念
subtitles.english: Tokoyami Towa 3rd Anniversary
